entities.name: Articque
entities.description: Target Company for Project INUK. Offers data analytics modules like DataComposer and DataViz.

keyInvestmentHighlights: Future consolidation of DataComposer and DataViz to unleash the power of big data analytics.

entities.name: DataComposer
entities.description: An easy-to-use Extract-Transform-Load (ETL) tool allowing non-specialists to integrate extremely large volumes of data to perform location-based analysis. Developed on PostGreSQL and .Net core. Currently in beta testing phase, planned availability by end Q4 2022 / Q1 2023.

entities.name: DataViz
entities.description: A cutting-edge web graphic rendering engine for tailored dynamic output visualization of large volume datasets processed by DataComposer. Aims to overcome current processing volume barriers and enable on-the-fly analysis iterations. Will replace Leaflet. POC completed; development to begin after DataComposer development is completed.

entities.name: Leaflet
entities.description: Current visualization tool provided by Articque, to be replaced by DataViz.

entities.name: ChapsVision
entities.description: Company associated with Project INUK, potentially as an acquirer or partner.

entities.name: Big Data Analytics
entities.description: Technological capability being unleashed by the consolidation of DataComposer and DataViz.

entities.name: Location-based analysis
entities.description: A use case targeted by DataComposer.
DataComposer is in beta testing phase with a selection of clients.
DataComposer will be available to all customers.
A Proof of Concept for DataViz has been completed by Articque's R&D team.
Development of DataViz will begin once DataComposer development is completed.
